## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a767141b77cd872e568e961df475d9f6c5be32b79c9c53533f1dfdc575d3a559)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'x-portrait' @ 99.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
